about.summary: Interface to the 'USGS' 'BISON' (<https://bison.usgs.gov/>) API, a 'database' for species occurrence data. Data comes from species in the United States from participating data providers. You can get data via 'taxonomic' and location based queries. A simple function is provided to help visualize data.

Interface to the 'USGS' 'BISON' (<https://bison.usgs.gov/>) API, a 'database' for species occurrence data. Data comes from species in the United States from participating data providers. You can get data via 'taxonomic' and location based queries. A simple function is provided to help visualize data.

name: r-rbison
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rbison
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rbison_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rbison/rbison_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9957e5f85ce68f5dd0ddc3c4b2b3c9d2f52d6f37587e1022ab8a44863534a83c

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-crul >=0.7.4
    - r-data.table
    - r-dplyr >=0.5.0
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-jsonlite >=1.1
    - r-mapproj
    - r-plyr
    - r-sp
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-crul >=0.7.4
    - r-data.table
    - r-dplyr >=0.5.0
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-jsonlite >=1.1
    - r-mapproj
    - r-plyr
    - r-sp

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rbison')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rbison')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ropensci/rbison
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Interface to the 'USGS' 'BISON' (<https://bison.usgs.gov/>) API, a 'database' for species occurrence data. Data comes from species in the United States from participating data providers. You can get data via 'taxonomic' and location based queries. A simple function is provided to help visualize data.
  license_family: MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: rbison
# Title: Interface to the 'USGS' 'BISON' API
# Description: Interface to the 'USGS' 'BISON' (<https://bison.usgs.gov/>) API, a 'database' for species occurrence data. Data comes from species in the United States from participating data providers. You can get data via 'taxonomic' and location based queries. A simple function is provided to help visualize data.

# LazyData: true
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Encoding: UTF-8
